# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int=10)
    wrapped_lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(current_line * " " * word) <= text_width
            current_line *= " " * word
        else
            push!(wrapped_lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        end
    end
    push!(wrapped_lines, current_line)
    return wrapped_lines
end
```
Example usage:
```julia
str = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua."
print(wrap_string(str))
# Lorem ipsum dolor
# sit amet, consectetur
# adipiscing elit, sed do
# eiusmod tempor incididunt
# ut labore et dolore
# magna aliqua.
```
